room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by The Escape Game Nashville in Nashville
review: We almost made it through Heist, but not quite, it was fun though !

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by The Escape Game Nashville in Nashville
review: Went for my birthday and it was the best time ever!!!

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by The Escape Game Nashville in Nashville
review: Took a group here for my daughter's 16th birthday. We had a blast!! Highly recommend. Worth the money

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by The Escape Game Nashville in Nashville
review: We did the Heist and escaped with only 7 seconds left in the clock. It was BEYOND. A GREAT time and well worth the money. Me and my friends are for sure going to have to do the escape games in our home town!

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by The Escape Game Nashville in Nashville
review: I went with my best friend for my birthday. It was so much fun and such a adrenaline rush at the end!!!! We had two other people and thank goodness they were there!!!! It took all of us contributing to even unlock a single thing!!! We finished the heist with 6 seconds to spare it was so much fun i cant wait to go back and try something new!!!

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by The Escape Game Nashville in Nashville
review: Went with my fellow Enlightened teammates from Ingress last night for my birthday. We did the Underground Playground room. None of us had ever played before so it was a very unique experience. I cannot wait to go back and try another game. We escaped!

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by The Escape Game Nashville in Nashville
review: My college buddies and I escaped The Heist room with seconds to spare. It was a blast and packed with clues. Everything happened so quickly at the end, and the discoveries came so fast and furious. Making it out and knowing how we all contributed (and couldn't have done it with even one person less) was totally exhilarating.
